sentences.en: 'Abracadabra,'said the conjuror as he pulled the rabbit from the hat.
sentences.cn: 魔术师囗中念念有词, 把兔子从礼帽中掏了出来.

sentences.en: a rabbit has been pulled out of the political hat.
sentences.cn: 神奇的是解决这一政治问题的办法像变戏法似地找到了。

sentences.en: At this time, a robust rabbit said: "No, or eat me !
sentences.cn: 这时，一只健壮的兔子又说：“不，还是先吃我吧！

sentences.en: He'd snared a rabbit earlier in the day.
sentences.cn: 那天早一点的时候，他设套捉了一只兔子。

sentences.en: His corporate's life will be as short as a rabbit's tail.
sentences.cn: 他的公司的寿命是兔子尾巴长不了.

sentences.en: If your rabbit happens to like carrots, you have to carefully ration the stuff.
sentences.cn: 如果碰巧你的兔子喜欢吃胡萝卜，那你就要小心给它定好分量了。

sentences.en: Is that your rabbit?
sentences.cn: 那是你的兔子吗?。

sentences.en: Mother rabbit told him that he was old enough to eat other food, but not keep pestering her to suckle.
sentences.cn: 兔妈妈让他不要老缠着妈妈吃奶，他已经能够自己去吃些别的东西啦。

sentences.en: Our dog will nose out a rabbit anywhere it hides.
sentences.cn: 无论兔子藏在哪里,我们的狗都会嗅出来.

sentences.en: Rabbit stew is one of chef Giancarlo Moeri's signature dishes.
sentences.cn: 炖野兔是厨师詹卡洛·莫里的招牌菜之一。

sentences.en: She and some tramps found the trail of rabbit.
sentences.cn: 她和一些流浪者发现了野兔的踪迹。

sentences.en: She wears a pair of gloves lined with rabbit.
sentences.cn: 她戴着一副兔毛衬里的手套.

sentences.en: The dog had chased a rabbit into its burrow.
sentences.cn: 狗把兔子追进了洞穴.

sentences.en: The hawk swooped down on the rabbit and killed it.
sentences.cn: 鹰猛地朝兔子扑下来,并把它杀死.

sentences.en: The hound nips at a rabbit.
sentences.cn: 猎犬在野兔身后紧追不舍。

sentences.en: The magician transformed the man into a rabbit.
sentences.cn: 魔术师把那个人变成了兔子.

sentences.en: The rabbit disappeared in the bushes.
sentences.cn: 那只兔子消失在树丛中。

sentences.en: The rabbit is a relatively recent introduction in Australia.
sentences.cn: 兔子是相对较新引入澳大利亚的物种.

sentences.en: The rabbIt'seems to be very alert all its life.
sentences.cn: 兔子似乎一生都小心翼翼,十分警觉.

sentences.en: The rabbIt'started off as soon as It'smelt the dogs.
sentences.cn: 野兔一嗅到有狗的气味便迅速跑开了.

sentences.en: The trap had cut deeply into the rabbit's flesh.
sentences.cn: 捕夹深深嵌入了兔子的肉里。

sentences.en: to snare a rabbit
sentences.cn: 套兔子

sentences.en: With a wave of his hand, the magician made the rabbit vanish.
sentences.cn: 魔术师手一挥兔子便不见了.

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)像兔子下崽似的生儿育女；大量繁殖

phrases.phrase: pull (或 bring) a rabbit out of the (或 a) hat
phrases.tran_cn: （尤指出乎意外）变戏法似的找到解决办法
兔耳（好奇凡事都想知道）；室内天线

trans.tran_cn: 兔子，野兔，兔子皮毛，兔子肉，〈俚〉新手，弱手
trans.tran_en: a small animal with long ears and soft fur, that lives in a hole in the ground
a small animal with long ears and soft fur, that lives in a hole in the ground

trans.tran_cn: 猎兔（通常作 go rabbiting），（兔子似的）聚拢在一起，<英俚>唠叨，喋喋不休（常与on about连用）
